item.title: By: Liam mc Donnell
item.dc:creator: Liam mc Donnell
item.description:
Dave
Check this new demo service out at www.mysay.com. It will allow you to set the team up as one single group and then simply make one voice message which will be sent to every player individually.
They, in turn, can respond to you by voice/mail and all for free !
cheers
Liam
item.content:encoded:
Dave

Check this new demo service out at http://www.mysay.com/. It will allow you to set the team up as one single group and then simply make one voice message which will be sent to every player individually.

They, in turn, can respond to you by voice/mail and all for free !

cheers

Liam
